| NaN | The raw materials used in the construction of this product comply with FDA regulation 177.1520 and are safe for food contact applications when used unmodified and in accordance with good manufacturing practices. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | The resin suppliers declare compliance with Commission Regulation (EC) No 552/2009 dated 22 June 2009 and Framework Regulation (EC) No. 1935/2004. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Polyester (PET) films in this product adhere to FDA regulation CFR177.1630. Only monomers listed in EC directive 975/2009/EC are used. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Polyethylene films with functional barriers comply with FDA regulation 175.300. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | The PVDC in our products is in line with EU Legislation: Regulation Plastic EU 10/2011, including the amendment EC 1183/2012. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Overall migration testing follows the BS EN ISO 1186 series of standards and Commission Regulation No. 10/2011, as subsequently amended. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | This product is manufactured without the use of post-consumer recycled materials. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Uncoated PET shows Oxygen Transmission Rates greater than 100cc. Test conditions: 23ºC and 50% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Coated PET shows Oxygen Transmission Rates less than 8cc. Test conditions: 23ºC and 50% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Metalised Polyester shows Oxygen Transmission Rates less than 0.6cc. Test conditions: 23ºC and 50% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Coated PET has a Water Moisture Transfer Rate of 11 grams. Test conditions: 38ºC and 90% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | This product complies with the South African Foodstuffs, Cosmetics and Disinfectants Act (Act 54 of 1972) and its associated food packaging and labelling regulations. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Storage Guidelines: The product must be stored at 5 – 35 ºC, shielded from direct sunlight and in a moisture-free environment.\t | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Cooking Limitations: This product is not designed to hold food during cooking. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | High-Temperature Caution: Take precautionary measures when packaging products under high heat or steam conditions. Continuous monitoring of material integrity is advised. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Acidity Monitoring: Products with elevated acidity levels must undergo post-packaging monitoring and must be fit for purpose. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Coated Material Limitation: Coated materials are not recommended for liquid packaging applications. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Migration Testing: Due to the varied applications for which this product may be used, migration testing is the user's responsibility to ensure compatibility and safety for their specific use. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Shelf Life of the Product: The product is designed for usage within a 6-month from receipt | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Shelf Life of Contents: Determining the shelf life of the contents packaged in this product is the responsibility of the customer or user. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Material Suitability: Products manufactured with Metalised Polyester material are optimally suited for packaging dry goods. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Zipper Specification: Pouches equipped with a resealable zipper are recommended for the packaging of dry or granular products. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Traceability: It is imperative to retain the carton labels featuring traceability details. If feedback is required, please submit these details in the prescribed manner | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
